H0.text: Microsporangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

H1.text: Ganglia is another name for anther pollen sacs.

H2.text: Megasporangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

H3.text: Gametangia are another name for anther pollen sacs.

A4.text: The microsporangia form sacs or pockets (locules) in the anther (anther sacs or pollen sacs).

A5.text: Heterosporous plants that produced microspores in microsporangia and megaspores in separate megasporangia evolved independently in several plant groups during the Devonian period.
